name: Superbike Race
description:
Best Superbike Arcade type race.
Advanced bike simulation with arcade touch.
Shoot your opponents with missiles you got.
On touching the screen your bike will slow down, you also get turbo boost to boost up you speed to cruise at high speeds.
You can shield yourself with stealth jackets, by activating them. If you activate, the impact with your opponents won't hurt you.
You get gyroscopic navigation in game, move your phone to turn left and right.
Make high scores and enjoy this exclusive game.
